name: Courtney Pope
text: Ordered a pizza and it was all wrong and the customer service was horrible rude.. they didnâ€™t seem apologetic and it took a very long time to get my food. Never coming again that place and works suck.

name: Melissa
text: We ordered a large pizza with bacon and banana peppers.. I would of rather got a frozen pizza from Tops.. Would have been better. Does NOT meet up to Pizza Hit standards..very disappointed.

name: Gerry Goff
text: Waited 45 minutes for a pizza to be delivered sopped in grease. Called and had it replaced, and waited 1 hour for new one  to come. On in would think that if your replacing someone's dinner it would be a priority. Not this case, I was told â€¦More

name: Chris Eby
text: Went here about 3 months ago and card reader wasnâ€™t working. 3 months later the card reader isnâ€™t working. I donâ€™t blame the people that work here. How is this a profitable store when their card reader is down? I went into the store â€¦More

name: Valarie Socha
text: Always reliable good pizza at this location. Just bummed corporate changed the up charge for the classic crust, it is what makes them stand out from the rest.

name: Rob Beckstrom
text: This place is very clean, there is never a wait and the staff are friendly. They have always gotten my order correct and they are always on time. It is always a pleasure getting a pizza from this Pizza Hut.

name: sam peckens
text: We just ordered a big dinner box for everyone at work and one of my co-workers was eating the Alfredo pasta and bit down on a FINGER NAIL!!!!!! We then called and told them and we received NO APOLOGY!!!! We donâ€™t want a credit as we are not â€¦More

text: Great pizza. Great price.

name: Holly Kelly
text: I recently visited the derby pizza hut location. I am not from around here, i am up visiting family for the holidays. First thing I noticed when walking into the store was how clean it was. Very different from ours back home. I was â€¦More

text: They fix my pizza just the way l like it.

name: Donald Butcher
text: Very good place to get pizza I love Pizza Hut pizza

name: Kal Marshall
text: Ordered 5$ pizzas was charged 6 each even after showing the total on my phone through their website. The pizza is fine but the restaurant will try to take extra cash out of you're pocket.

name: Sue Livingston
text: this pizza hut is not serving pizza hut quality pizza. had the pizza twice will not eat there again so disappointed.  i use to love pizza hut.

name: Emilee Barone
text: this pizza hut is incredible. staff are so kind. food is great. eat here every week never get sick of it. great deals such as the $5 flavor menu (btw pan pizzas are $6... its on the menu... just an fyi) and the 2 mediums AWYWI for $6.99 each. love u derby pizza hut.

name: Larry R
text: Typical food for a national chain, friendly staff, inexpensive if you order online or from their app.

name: timothy correa
text: Friendly service and very clean place

name: Toni Brown
text:
